fields.name: ref_number
fields.title: Reference Number
fields.description: This field is populated by the user. It is a unique reference number given to each line item in the spreadsheet. Having a unique identifier for each item will allow users locate a specific item in the registry should they need to modify or delete.

fields.name: file_id_number
fields.title: File Identification Number
fields.description: This field will contain the file identification number of the founded wrongdoing file.

fields.name: file_id_date
fields.title: File Identification date
fields.description: This field will provide the date that the file was created/received.

fields.name: case_description_en
fields.title: English Case Description
fields.description: The field will contain the case description, in English.

fields.name: case_description_fr
fields.title: French Case Description
fields.description: This field will contain the case description, in French.

fields.name: findings_conclusions
fields.title: Findings and Conclusions
fields.description: The field will contain value(s) a â€“ f, separated by commas if more than one value.

fields.name: recommendations_corrective_measures_en
fields.title: English Recommendations and Corrective Measures
fields.description: The Field will contain the Recommendations and Corrective Measures as per the article 11 of the Public Servants Disclosure Protection Act, in English.

fields.name: recommendations_corrective_measures_fr
fields.title: French Recommendations and Corrective Measures
fields.description: The Field will contain the Recommendations and Corrective Measures as per the article 11 of the Public Servants Disclosure Protection Act, in French.
